name: Granite Fissure: First Shard
description: Copolia's granite spine splits around a lone bone-iron shard. Kassim pries it free while seven chalk tallies grind under Naia's thumb and nine fruit bats dust the map before Maliya seals clove smoke into the fissure.
riddle: Stone remembers with seven marks, sky agrees with nine wings—align them to feel the pull.
